articles.title: Talks Held between Vice-Chairman of C.C., WPK and Secretary General of Political Party of DR Congo
articles.content:
Talks Held between Vice-Chairman of C.C., WPK and Secretary General of Political Party of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Talks were held between Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), on a visit to DR Congo as head of a WPK delegation and Henri Mova Sakanyi, secretary general of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of DR Congo on August 14.
					 Ri Su Yong said that all party members, service personnel and people are pushing forward the building of a socialist power under the outstanding and experienced leadership of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, full of confidence and optimism about the final victory in hearty response to the decision of the 7th Congress of the Party.
					
					 He clarified the validity of the WPK's line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force and stressed the consistent stand of the WPK to achieve the reunification of the country on the principle of national independence, guided by the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 The secretary general once again extended sincere warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the WPK on behalf of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of DR Congo and on his own behalf.
					
					 The visit of the WPK delegation greatly encourages the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of DR Congo in its struggle for smashing foreign forces' interference in its internal affairs and pressure and achieving its social stability, he said, and went on:
					
					 The powerful WPK is a model in the world as it is frustrating the imperialists' vicious moves for isolating and stifling the DPRK and carrying out its cause.
					
					 The secretary general expressed the full support for the independent policy of the WPK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is personifying the leadership traits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and applying a unique political mode, he pointed out. 
					
					 He said the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of DR Congo will as ever positively support the cause of the WPK and the Korean people for achieving the reunification of the country independently and peacefully.
					
					 Present at the talks were members of the WPK delegation, Jo Yong Nam, charge d' affaires ad interim of the DPRK Embassy in Kinshasa, the deputy secretary general of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of DR Congo and other members of the leadership of the party.
					
					 The WPK delegation was present on invitation at the reception given by the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of DR Congo that day.

articles.title: Spokesman for CPRC Lashes out at Park Geun Hye for Her Invectives against DPRK
articles.content:
Spokesman for CPRC Lashes out at Park Geun Hye for Her Invectives against DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country of the DPRK released a statement on Tuesday denouncing Park Geun Hye of south Korea for spouting invectives stunning the public at home and abroad in her "address" on Monday.
					 What Park spouted in her "address" are peppered with impudent remarks for covering up the crimes she committed by turning south Korea into an unheard-of veritable hell of confusion, conflict and illegality through her corrupt and incompetent rule of treachery and driving the inter-Korean relations into a catastrophe, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Park, a colonial servant getting desperate in putting pressure on the DPRK pursuant to the U.S. war moves against it, took issue with it over its nuclear deterrent, a treasured sword of justice for protecting the destiny of the nation and preserving peace on the Korean peninsula, while putting under the carpet the crimes committed by her group.
					
					 This is, indeed, preposterous.
					
					 This time, Park again termed her regime's reckless moves for deploying THAAD in the face of strong criticism by the public at home and abroad a "step for the right to self-defense." This is just a lame excuse and she should know that no one will be taken in by such sophism of a puppet that can do nothing without an approval of her U.S. master.
					
					 Park, who is chiefly to blame for reducing south Korea to a tundra of democracy, civil rights and people's livelihood, malignantly pulled up the DPRK where all dreams and ideals of the people are coming true on the people-first principle. This is no more than nonsense talked by a psychopath.
					
					 Unpardonable is that Park openly revealed her wild dream for "unification through absorption", not content with crying out for getting rid of "terror" for peace on the Korean peninsula and the future of the nation. She was so impudent as to ask others to join in "the effort for ushering in the era of unification" desired by her.
					
					 If she, a traitor barely prolonging her remaining days by kowtowing to the U.S., pursues the wild dream of "unification through absorption", daring seek to topple down the DPRK, the DPRK will clearly show her what style reunification it will achieve to realize the desire of all Koreans for reunification before the end of her dirty life.
					
					 It is a tragedy and disgrace to the nation that such hideous confrontation maniacs as Park go with impunity only to bring misfortune and disaster to all Koreans.
					
					 If such traitors as Park go scot-free, misfortune and pain of the south Korean people will get worse and all compatriots will never evade the disaster of a nuclear war, and when the outside forces and pro-U.S., pro-Japanese traitors are eliminated at an early date, the day of the complete liberation of the country-the independent reunification will be hastened.
					
					 This is the conclusion drawn by the DPRK again.
					
					 Traitor Park should bear in mind that her desperate moves to escape ruin through awful tongue-lashing and reckless confrontation will only precipitate the miserable end of her fate, cursed and censured by all Koreans.

articles.title: DPRK High-level Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK High-level Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- A DPRK high-level delegation headed by Choe Ryong Hae, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, flew back home Tuesday after taking part in the 31st Olympic Games being held in Rio de Janeiro.

articles.title: Russian Orthodox Church Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Russian Orthodox Church Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Russian Orthodox Church led by Antonii, chief for Administration of its Overseas Organs, left here for home on Tuesday after attending the ceremony marking the 10th anniversary of the Jongbaek Church.
					 During their stay here, the members of the delegation visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and paid homage to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. They had a talk with Kim Yong Dae, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and chairman of the C.C., the Korean Social Democratic Party.
					
					 They also visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of Kim Il Sung, and the Tower of the Juche Idea, Arch of Triumph, Sci-Tech Complex, Nature Museum, Central Zoo, etc.

articles.title: ITF President Here
articles.content:
ITF President Here
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Son, president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation (ITF), arrived here Tuesday.

articles.title: ITF President Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
ITF President Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Tuesday.
					 He laid a bouquet before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Nepali President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Nepali President
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Bidhya Devi Bhandari, president of the Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal, on August 14.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend warm congratulations to you upon your election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK at the Fourth Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly on behalf of the government and people of Nepal and on my own behalf.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I wish you good health and the people of the DPRK peace, prosperity and happiness.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador to DPRK Gives Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador to DPRK Gives Reception
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Matsegora gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club Tuesday on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Present there on invitation were Vice Foreign Minister Kung Sok Ung, Sim Kuk Ryong, Ri Kwang Gun, Song Chun Sop and other officials concerned.
					
					 Staff members of the Russian Embassy were present there.

articles.title: National Exhibition and Presentation of Sci-Tech Achievements in Field of Fuel for Inhabitants Open
articles.content:
National Exhibition and Presentation of Sci-Tech Achievements in Field of Fuel for Inhabitants Open
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition and presentation of sci-tech achievements in the field of fuel for inhabitants opened with due ceremony at the Sci-Tech Complex on Tuesday.
					 Present at the exhibition and presentation are the units in Pyongyang and local areas related to the development and introduction of fuel for inhabitants such as Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, the State Academy of Sciences and the Ministry of Commerce.
					
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition are more than 370 scientific and technological achievements and products.
					
					 The exhibition and presentation were divided into three panels.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Ri Chung Gil, chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission, officials concerned and officials, scientists, technicians, teachers, workers and three-revolution team members of the units which presented exhibits.
					
					 Vice-Premier Ri Ju O made an opening address.
					
					 The exhibition and presentation will last till August 23.

articles.title: Pyongyang Taedonggang Beer Festival
articles.content:
Pyongyang Taedonggang Beer Festival
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Taedonggang Beer Festival is going on with large attendance on the bank of the picturesque River Taedong.
					 The Taedonggang beer is regarded as a pride of Pyongyang. It is brewed with natural water under an upper district of the River Taedong, barley and rice of South Hwanghae Province and hops of Ryanggang Province as its main raw materials.
					
					 Established throughout its production process are the quality control system ISO 9001 and food safety control systems HACCP and ISO 22000.
					
					 The Taedonggang beer was evaluated as one of the best domestic products and awarded the Dec. 15 medal for quality. And its quality and taste have been highly appraised, when compared with world-famous beers.
					
					 Ri Pong Hak, manager of the Taedonggang Beer Factory, told KCNA that seven kinds of beers are served at the festival.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un, Defender of Peace and Security
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un, Defender of Peace and Security
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- It is the constant policy of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and unanimous will of all the Koreans to prevent the danger of war and safeguard the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula. 
					The year 2015 was the year of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation, but the U.S. imperialists kicked off Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills in collusion of the south Korean puppet forces and they instigated the south Korean military warmongers to fake up the "mine explosion" case and the "north's shelling" incident, driving the situation to an extreme in August.
					
					Under the crucial situation, Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, convened an emergency enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the WPK on August 20, Juche 104 (2015) to discuss a plan for the political and military counteractions to foil the enemies' moves for war. And he issued an order of the supreme commander of the Korean People's Army that the area along the front should be put in a quasi-state of war. It was an important decision for defending the dignity and sovereignty of the nation.
					
					The world media reported that "the world witnesses another brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu," "death-defying spirit of defending the homeland, eruption of retaliation will" and "the DPRK gives a warning of merciless strike to the U.S. and south Korea."
					
					The warmongers were at a loss what to do, disheartened at the invincible military power of the DPRK and indomitable spirit of its people who turned out as one to smash their provocative moves.
					
					Thanks to the initiative shown by the DPRK, the north-south high-level urgent contact took place to have a wide-ranging discussion on various issues of averting the armed conflict and improving the north-south relations and issued a joint press release.
					
					Referring to the instructions given by Kim Jong Un at an enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the WPK that the north and the south should respect the agreements made at the high-level urgent contact to bear a rich fruit, south Korean experts in Korean issues said that "First Chairman Kim Jong Un indicated the future direction of south-north relations." 
					
					Political and public figures of different countries in their statements fully supported the just and fair measures taken by the DPRK for defending peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and the sovereignty of the country. 
					
					Kim Jong Un indicated in detail the ways for protecting the peace and security on the peninsula and achieving the independent reunification of the country in his report to the WPK Seventh Congress on the Work of the Central Committee and the New Year Address.
					
					Recently, the DPRK, in reflection of the unanimous aspiration and demand of the fellow countrymen, proposed the convention of a joint conference of political parties, organizations and individual personages of the north, the south and abroad for the peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula, which has been fully supported by all Koreans as well as the international community.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Raps Park Geun Hye's Sleight of Hand to Deploy THAAD in South Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Raps Park Geun Hye's Sleight of Hand to Deploy THAAD in South Korea
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea recently invited the lawmakers of Taegu and North Kyongsang Province origin to visit Chongwadae and told them that "if Songju County recommends another site for THAAD, she would examine whether there is a suitable other place, instead of the Songsan battery in the county."
					Commenting on her gibberish, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this is a cynical ploy to get rid of the worst ruling crisis in south Korea.
					
					The commentary continues:
					
					With no artifice can Park weather the crisis and calm down the people's mounting anti-"government" sentiment.
					
					As recognized by the domestic and world public, THAAD is not for the south Korean people, but it is to serve the U.S. aggressive purpose from A to Z.
					
					This being a hard reality, the Park Geun Hye group keen on stepping up sycophancy towards the U.S. and escalating the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north are running the whole gamut of sleights of hand to deploy the THAAD in south Korea in a sinister bid to make the Koreans fall victim to the U.S. policy of aggression and carry out their scenario for invading the north at any cost. 
					
					For the Koreans, Park is a devil more harmful than the THAAD and a source of disaster that should be eliminated without delay.
					
					The south Korean people of all social standings desirous of peace against foreign domination and subjugation and war are called upon to turn out in a more dynamic mass struggle to punish the Park group for blatantly challenging the public will and desire and adding to the hideous crimes by advocating the THAAD deployment.

articles.title: No THAAD Actions Staged in Seoul
articles.content:
No THAAD Actions Staged in Seoul
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- All-people peace action took place at the Seoul City Office plaza on August 14 in demand of the retraction of the decision on THAAD deployment, according to the south Korean internet paper Tongil News.
					 Attending it were thousands of people including Seoul citizens from all walks of life, members of civic and public organizations and Songju County residents.
					
					 Prior to the action, all-people rally for peace against war took place in Ryongsan, Seoul. 
					
					 Participants in the rally in a protest letter to the commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea demanded the U.S. stop forcing the south Korean people to sacrifice themselves for its interests and immediately withdraw the decision to deploy THAAD.

articles.title: Meeting Held in Russia
articles.content:
Meeting Held in Russia
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held by the Russian public preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu on the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's historic visit to Russia and the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Displayed at the venue of the meeting were photos dealing with the immortal external activities of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Present there were figures of the government, political parties, organizations and institutions including the Russian Foreign Ministry, the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK and the Russian Academy of Science.
					
					 Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, said in a report that we celebrate Kim Jong Il's visit to Russia every August.
					
					 He made great contributions to the development of the Russia-DPRK friendly relations through his several visits to Russia, the chairman said, and went on:
					
					 Aug. 15 is the significant day when the Korean people defeated the Japanese imperialists and accomplished the historic cause of Korea's liberation under the leadership of the great Comrade Kim Il Sung.
					
					 I sincerely wish the Korean people only victory and glory in the future, too.

articles.title: Korea's Liberation Day Marked by Myanmar Personage
articles.content:
Korea's Liberation Day Marked by Myanmar Personage
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, made public a statement on August 11.
					 Extending sincere congratulations to the Korean people on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation, the statement said:
					
					 Under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung the Korean people achieved the historic cause of liberation of the country on August 15, 1945.
					
					 Thanks to him Korea was liberated and the Korean nation brought about a radical turn in its destiny.
					
					 His cause was successfully carried forward by H.E. Kim Jong Il and it is steadily carried forward by H.E. Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Korean people will win a great victory in the building of a socialist power and the struggle for national reunification under the wise leadership of H.E. Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung and H.E. Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Peerlessly Great Men of Mt. Paektu Praised by German Body
articles.content:
Peerlessly Great Men of Mt. Paektu Praised by German Body
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- There took place a seminar on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un by the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany on August 11 on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation and the Day of Songun.
					 The chief of the group said that Kim Il Sung put an end to the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists and achieved the historic cause of liberation of Korea 71 years ago.
					
					 He said after Kim Jong Il started his Songun revolutionary leadership 56 years ago, he strengthened the military capability in every way, turning the DPRK into a political and ideological power and a military power.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Now the U.S. and its followers are desperately trying to stifle those countries disobedient to them. However, they dare not bring down the DPRK, a country possessed of powerful nuclear deterrence.
					
					 The DPRK is the only independent state in the world as it is firmly protecting the sovereignty and dignity of the country and nation, bravely standing against the U.S.
					
					 Thanks to the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un the DPRK is further demonstrating its might as a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence as wished by the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Under his leadership the Korean people will surely achieve the independent reunification of the country.

articles.title: Lecture in Guinea Observes Anniversary of Korea's Liberation
articles.content:
Lecture in Guinea Observes Anniversary of Korea's Liberation
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- There was a lecture at a Guinean company on Aug. 10 to observe the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 An official of the company said that President Kim Il Sung, the father of socialist Korea, achieved the historic cause of Korea's liberation through an armed struggle on Aug. 15, 1945.
					
					 He noted that the undying exploits the President performed by liberating the country through Songun revolutionary leadership will shine long in the world history of national liberation against imperialism.

articles.title: Internet News of Mauritania Introduces Masikryong Ski Resort in DPRK
articles.content:
Internet News of Mauritania Introduces Masikryong Ski Resort in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- An internet news of Mauritania introduced the Masikryong Ski Resort in the DPRK on Aug. 10.
					 Noting the ski resort opened in the DPRK a few years ago, it said:
					
					 Not only Korean men and women of all ages but also foreigners visit the resort and spend their leisure time every day.
					
					 The resort having modern equipment is drawing visitors not only in winter but also in summer.
					
					 Masikryong Hotel with excellent swimming pool and amusement room is adding to pleasure of visitors.
					
					 The Korean people are leading a highly civilized and happy life at the resort built under the meticulous care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Tienen lugar conversaciones entre Ri Su Yong y Henri Mova Sakanyi
articles.content:
Tienen lugar conversaciones entre Ri Su Yong y Henri Mova Sakanyi
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 14 las conversaciones entre Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, quien realiza una visita a la Republica Democratica del Congo al frente de la delegacion del PTC, y Henri Mova Sakanyi, secretario general del Partido Popular por la Reconstruccion y la Democracia del Congo Democratico.
					En la ocasion, el visitante coreano senalo que bajo la destacada y diestra orientacion del Presidente del PTC, Kim Jong Un, todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y el pueblo coreano aceleran energicamente la construccion de una potencia socialista con la conviccion y optimismo de la victoria final en acato a la resolucion del 7o Congreso del PTC.
					
					Reitero la justeza de la linea del PTC sobre el impulso simultaneo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares y la invariable posicion del PTC de realizar la reunificacion del pais en el principio de independencia nacional y bajo el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					A su vez, Henri Mova Sakanyi volvio a extender a Kim Jong Un las cordiales y sinceras felicitaciones en nombre de su partido y en el suyo propio por su eleccion como Presidente del PTC. 
					
					Puntualizo que la presente visita de la delegacion del PTC deviene un gran estimulo para su partido que libra una lucha por lograr la estabilidad social del pais frustrando la intervencion en asuntos internos y la presion de las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					Agrego que sirve de ejemplo mundial el poderoso PTC que se esfuerza por cumplir su causa frustrando las brutales tentativas de aislamiento y aplastamiento de los imperialistas y expuso el entero apoyo a la politica independiente del PTC. 
					
					Se refirio a que el Presidente del PTC Kim Jong Un practica un original modo politico encarnando las cualidades de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Al finalizar, recalco que su partido seguira apoyando activamente la causa del PTC y el pueblo coreano por realizar la reunificacion del pais de manera independiente y pacifica. 
					
					Tomaron parte en la charla los miembros de la delegacion del PTC, el encargado de negocios a. i. de la RPDC acreditado en el pais africano, Jo Yong Nam, y el subsecretario general y otros miembros de la direccion del Partido Popular por la Reconstruccion y la Democracia del Congo Democratico.
					
					Ese dia, la delegacion coreana fue invitada a la recepcion ofrecida por el partido anfitrion.

articles.title: Portavoz de CRPP denuncia "discurso de felicitacion" de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Portavoz de CRPP denuncia "discurso de felicitacion" de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 16 una declaracion condenando a Park Geun-hye que en un "discurso de felicitacion" pronuncio el dia 15 las sofisterias que sorprenden al interior y exterior del pais.
					El "discurso de felicitacion" de Park esta caracterizado por las palabrerias descaradas para encubrir sus culpas de haber convertido el Sur de Corea en la escena de caos y discordias y el mundo anarquico y llevado las relaciones intercoreanas a la catastrofe, senalo el vocero y prosiguio:
					
					Resulta muy absurdo el hecho de que Park, lacaya fiel colonial que adhiriendose a las maniobras de guerra de agresion de Estados Unidos contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se aferra al aplastamiento anti-RPDC, no refirio nada a sus crimenes, sino cuestiono nuestro justo remedio omnipotente nuclear que defiende el destino de la nacion y la paz de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Esta vez, Park volvio a justificar como "medida autodefensiva" la ubicacion de THAAD, objeto de gran condena interna y externa. Pero, ella debe saber que nadie sera enganado por tales sofisterias de la marioneta, quien no puede hacer nada sin permiso de su amo gringo.
					
					Park Geun-hye, autora quien convirtio toda la extension surcoreana en el lugar carente de la democracia, los derechos y la vida de los habitantes, difamo con maldades a la RPDC donde se florecen plenamente los suenos e ideales del pueblo gracias a la materializacion de la idea de dar prioridad a las masas populares, lo que no pasa de ser un delirio de la psicopata.
					
					Lo mas intolerable es que Park, al hablar de la necesidad de eliminar un supuesto "pavor" para la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y el futuro de la nacion, expuso abiertamente el sueno irrealizable de la "unificacion mediante la absorbicion" y pidio que "se esforzaran juntos por abrir la era de unificacion" que ella desea.
					
					Si esta traidora, que mantiene a duras penas su vida restante bajo el amparo de su amo norteamericano, persigue el sueno de la "unificacion mediante la absorbicion" codiciando atrevidamente a la RPDC, le mostraremos correctamente antes de que ella diera ultimo aliento la reunificacion realizada a nuestro estilo.
					
					La tragedia y la verguenza de la nacion son precisamente el hecho de que esta viva todavia Park Geun-hye, diabla conflictiva sin par quien impone a los coreanos las desgracias y las calamidades.
					
					Si dejan intactos los traidores a la nacion como Park, se recrudeceran las desgracias y las penalidades de los habitantes surcoreanos y toda la nacion coreana no podra evitar la calamidad de guerra nuclear. Solo cuando eliminen cuanto antes a los traidores pro-yanquis y pro-japoneses, se adelantara el dia de la liberacion completa-reunificacion independiente de la patria. Esto es nuestra conclusion que volvemos a tomar.
					
					ã€€Park debe saber que cuanto mas se desespera para liberarse del abismo de la destruccion soltando las sofisterias y alborotos conflictivos, tanto mas adelantara el destino tragico bajo el repudio y la condena de todos los coreanos.

articles.title: Vuelve la delegacion coreana de alto nivel a XXXI Juegos Olimpicos
articles.content:
Vuelve la delegacion coreana de alto nivel a XXXI Juegos Olimpicos
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ACNC) -- La delegacion de alto nivel de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, encabezada por el vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC, Choe Ryong Hae, volvio a la patria este martes luego de participar en los XXXI Juegos Olimpicos de Rio de Janeiro, Brasil.

articles.title: Llega presidente de ITF
articles.content:
Llega presidente de ITF
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ACNC) -- Arribo hoy a esta capital Ri Yong Son, presidente de la Federacion Internacional de Taekwondo.
